mapper.select: select id, title, stock, line_price, sale_price from scenic_ticket where deleted = false and end_date > now() and scenic_id = #{scenicId} order by id desc
mapper.update: update scenic_ticket set stock = stock + #{num}, sale_num = sale_num - #{num}, total_num = total_num - #{num} where id = #{id} and stock + #{num} >= 0 and deleted = false
mapper.select: select IFNULL(min(sale_price),0) as minPrice, IFNULL(max(sale_price),0) as maxPrice from scenic_ticket where scenic_id = #{scenicId} and deleted = false
mapper.update: update scenic_ticket t, scenic r set r.score = #{score} where t.scenic_id = r.id and t.id = #{id}
